casebody.data:
In re KBB and KAB. No. 179P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 28, 2005. Lynne G. Schiftan, Deputy County Attorney, for Dept. of Social Services.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of April 2005 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of April 2005."
